## Icon.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Icon` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(block: BlockSvg);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | [BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg.md) | The block associated with this icon. |
